description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Just push A!  Avoid bottomless pits, spikes, the Wall of Death and bring your Avatar to safety.  With each level comes a new A Button challenge.  Discover what the A-button does, tap it slowly, press it fast, or hold it down to get past the treacherous obstacles.
description.short: Just push A!  Avoid bottomless pits, spikes, the Wall of Death and bring your Avatar to safety.  With each level comes a new A Button challenge.  Discover what the A-button does, tap it slowly, press it fast, or hold it down to get past the treacherous obstacles.
